caption.p: The effect of S. canadensis EO on mycelium electrical conductivity of the tested fungi. I: Botrytis cinerea; II: Monilinia fructicola; III: Aspergillus niger; IV: Penicillium expansum. Where Sc2000, Sc1000, Sc500, and Sc250 are the tested concentrations of S. canadensis EO at 2000, 1000, 500, and 250 Âµg/mL, respectively. Cont.: control potato dextrose broth (PDB).
